title: Blinken joins Biden in accusing Russia of war crimes; 21 people killed in rocket barrage as invasion enters 4th week: Live Ukraine updates
content:
1. Blinken joins Biden in accusing Russia of war crimes; 21 people killed in rocket barrage as invasion enters 4th week: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  2. American citizen killed in Ukraine, State Department says: LIVE UPDATES  Fox News
  3. Six countries including UK and US accuse Russia of war crimes in Ukraine  The Guardian
  4. Ukraine War News Live: China's Silence on Russian Attacks 'Speak Volumes'  Newsweek
  5. Russia-Ukraine War News Live Updates: Mariupol Evacuees Leave the Besieged City  The Wall Street Journal

localize.title: ブリンケンがバイデンとともにロシアの戦争犯罪を非難、侵攻4週目に入りロケット弾で21人死亡。ウクライナの最新情報
布林肯与拜登一起指责俄罗斯的战争罪行；入侵进入第4周，21人在火箭弹袭击中死亡。乌克兰实时更新
布林肯與拜登一起指責俄羅斯的戰爭罪行；入侵進入第4周，21人在火箭彈襲擊中死亡。烏克蘭實時更新
